current_company.name: Share.Market by PhonePe
current_company.title: Head of Growth for Equities at Share.Market by PhonePe

positions.subtitle: Share.Market by PhonePe
positions.description: As the Head of Business for Equities, I drive growth strategies for the equity segment, encompassing both delivery and intraday products. My focus areas include:- Product Strategy: Spearheading initiatives for equity-focused offerings such as factor analysis, WealthBaskets, and collections involving stocks or ETFs- Customer Insights & Personas: Building detailed customer personas to craft tailored strategies for acquisition, activation, and retention- Data-Driven Optimization: Analyzing key metrics like push notification and email open rates, time spent on content, conversion ratios, and CTRs to develop strategies for continuous improvement- Cross-Functional Collaboration: Partnering with content, design, and video teams to create compelling assets that drive engagement and growth across CRM and other channels
positions.title: Head of Growth - Equities
positions.description_html:
As the Head of Business for Equities, I drive growth strategies for the equity segment, encompassing both delivery and intraday products. My focus areas include:

- Product Strategy: Spearheading initiatives for equity-focused offerings such as factor analysis, WealthBaskets, and collections involving stocks or ETFs

- Customer Insights & Personas: Building detailed customer personas to craft tailored strategies for acquisition, activation, and retention

- Data-Driven Optimization: Analyzing key metrics like push notification and email open rates, time spent on content, conversion ratios, and CTRs to develop strategies for continuous improvement

- Cross-Functional Collaboration: Partnering with content, design, and video teams to create compelling assets that drive engagement and growth across CRM and other channels

positions.subtitle: SharedotMarket
positions.description: As the Head of Content and Education at Share.Market, I played a key role in building the brand from scratch, and was involved in the successful launch of the broking platform in August 2023. As part of the top management team, I led the strategy and execution of content initiatives that shaped the platformâ€™s identity and user engagement.Key Highlights:- Strategic Leadership: Designed and executed the content strategy, aligning with business, product, and compliance goals. Built a 10-member team from scratch, including writers, designers, and video editors- Content Ownership: Created and reviewed customer-facing content, including FAQs, product notes, push notifications, emails, and videos. Led content for products like factor analysis, WealthBaskets, technical analysis tools, derivatives, etc.- Social Media Growth: Developed the social media strategy, growing followers across social media channels quickly and launching a YouTube presence with engaging financial content- Video Production: Set up an in-house studio, scripting and anchoring short and long-form videos, including 1-hour education modules and market explainer videos. Collaborated with The Economic Times on factor analysis videos- Market-Focused Content: Monitored daily stock market trends to create timely, relevant content in static and video formats. Published blog articles to establish thought leadership- Collaboration and Training: Worked closely with compliance, product, analytics, customer success, PR and brand marketing teams. Conducted training for internal teams on financial concepts- Media Recognition: Featured in MoneyControl, Zee Business, Mint, and Business Standard, contributing to Share.Market's visibilityFrom setting up the brand identity to creating high-impact educational content, Iâ€™ve ensured Share.Market stands out as a trusted name in the broking space
positions.title: Head of Content and Education
positions.description_html:
As the Head of Content and Education at Share.Market, I played a key role in building the brand from scratch, and was involved in the successful launch of the broking platform in August 2023.

As part of the top management team, I led the strategy and execution of content initiatives that shaped the platformâ€™s identity and user engagement.

Key Highlights:
- Strategic Leadership: Designed and executed the content strategy, aligning with business, product, and compliance goals. Built a 10-member team from scratch, including writers, designers, and video editors

- Content Ownership: Created and reviewed customer-facing content, including FAQs, product notes, push notifications, emails, and videos. Led content for products like factor analysis, WealthBaskets, technical analysis tools, derivatives, etc.

- Social Media Growth: Developed the social media strategy, growing followers across social media channels quickly and launching a YouTube presence with engaging financial content

- Video Production: Set up an in-house studio, scripting and anchoring short and long-form videos, including 1-hour education modules and market explainer videos. Collaborated with The Economic Times on factor analysis videos

- Market-Focused Content: Monitored daily stock market trends to create timely, relevant content in static and video formats. Published blog articles to establish thought leadership

- Collaboration and Training: Worked closely with compliance, product, analytics, customer success, PR and brand marketing teams. Conducted training for internal teams on financial concepts

- Media Recognition: Featured in MoneyControl, Zee Business, Mint, and Business Standard, contributing to Share.Market's visibility

From setting up the brand identity to creating high-impact educational content, Iâ€™ve ensured Share.Market stands out as a trusted name in the broking space

experience.title: Head - Partnerships and Sales
experience.description: - Led partnerships and sales at WealthDesk, a B2B2C platform enabling SEBI-licensed RIAs and RAs to offer curated portfolios (WealthBaskets) to broking customers- Scaled the platform by increasing:       - WealthBasket curators from 5 to 25.       - Broking partners from 10 to 20.       - Introduced 5 independent distributors from scratch- Managed and developed end-to-end responsibilities for curators and brokers, including outreach, negotiations, onboarding, and servicing- Worked closely on product management, conceptualizing new features and implementing logics for initial investment and rebalancing for WealthBaskets- Instrumental in scaling the startup from 15 to 50 employees and setting up customer success, operations, and partnerships teams- Played a key role in handling compliance and legal functions within a tightly regulated industry- WealthDesk got acquired by PhonePe in August 2022 and hence I transitioned to PhonePe
experience.description_html: - Led partnerships and sales at WealthDesk, a B2B2C platform enabling SEBI-licensed RIAs and RAs to offer curated portfolios (WealthBaskets) to broking customers- Scaled the platform by increasing: - WealthBasket curators from 5 to 25. - Broking partners from 10 to 20. - Introduced 5 independent distributors from scratch- Managed and developed end-to-end responsibilities for curators and brokers, including outreach, negotiations, onboarding, and servicing- Worked closely on product management, conceptualizing new features and implementing logics for initial investment and rebalancing for WealthBaskets- Instrumental in scaling the startup from 15 to 50 employees and setting up customer success, operations, and partnerships teams- Played a key role in handling compliance and legal functions within a tightly regulated industry- WealthDesk got acquired by PhonePe in August 2022 and hence I transitioned to PhonePe

experience.title: Partner - Investments, Private Wealth Management
experience.description: - Portfolio Management for HNI / UHNI clients, PE and VC partners- Understand and pertain to solve any financial service requirement for founders and promoters, specially start ups- Analyze the risk profile, recommend appropriate asset allocation and provide continuous detailed analytics on the overall portfolio of the client- Provide gateway into Edelweiss Financial Services and the network to the clients- Be the single point of contact for any advise and help related to financial services
experience.description_html: - Portfolio Management for HNI / UHNI clients, PE and VC partners- Understand and pertain to solve any financial service requirement for founders and promoters, specially start ups- Analyze the risk profile, recommend appropriate asset allocation and provide continuous detailed analytics on the overall portfolio of the client- Provide gateway into Edelweiss Financial Services and the network to the clients- Be the single point of contact for any advise and help related to financial services

positions.subtitle: Deutsche Bank
positions.description: - Over 2 years of hands-on experience in origination and execution of ECM transactions in India- Worked on the analysis and development of transaction ideas for discussion with clients, marketing and investor targeting analysis, equity fund raising process for different products- Overall coordination of transactions from mandate to closing which involved managing marketing processes like roadshows, investor education, book building, among others- Updating senior bankers and clients on market movements, views on global economy and its impactsKey transaction experience:- US$1.0bn IPO of Embassy Office REIT (2019) - India's first ever REIT to be listed- US$1.7bn IPO of GIC Re (2017) - India's first Reinsurance company to be listed, largest IPO since 2010, 3rd largest IPO ever - US$1.3bn IPO of SBI Life (2017) - India's 2nd largest life insurance IPO at the time of listing- US$903m IPO of ICICI Prudential Life Insurance (2016) - India's 1st life insurance company to be listed- US$2.3bn QIP of SBI (2017) - Largest QIP ever - US$387m QIP of Federal Bank of India (2017)- US$75m block sale for Manipal promoters in Quess Corp Limited (2018)- US$289m block sale for IHH Healthcare stake in Apollo Hospitals Enterprise Ltd (2017)- US$550m block sale for ING Mauritius stake in Kotak Mahindra Bank (2016)- OFS of BEL, NALCO, NLC (2017)
positions.title: Associate, India Investment Banking
positions.description_html:
- Over 2 years of hands-on experience in origination and execution of ECM transactions in India
- Worked on the analysis and development of transaction ideas for discussion with clients, marketing and investor targeting analysis, equity fund raising process for different products
- Overall coordination of transactions from mandate to closing which involved managing marketing processes like roadshows, investor education, book building, among others
- Updating senior bankers and clients on market movements, views on global economy and its impacts

Key transaction experience:
- US$1.0bn IPO of Embassy Office REIT (2019) - India's first ever REIT to be listed
- US$1.7bn IPO of GIC Re (2017) - India's first Reinsurance company to be listed, largest IPO since 2010, 3rd largest IPO ever
- US$1.3bn IPO of SBI Life (2017) - India's 2nd largest life insurance IPO at the time of listing
- US$903m IPO of ICICI Prudential Life Insurance (2016) - India's 1st life insurance company to be listed
- US$2.3bn QIP of SBI (2017) - Largest QIP ever
- US$387m QIP of Federal Bank of India (2017)
- US$75m block sale for Manipal promoters in Quess Corp Limited (2018)
- US$289m block sale for IHH Healthcare stake in Apollo Hospitals Enterprise Ltd (2017)
- US$550m block sale for ING Mauritius stake in Kotak Mahindra Bank (2016)
- OFS of BEL, NALCO, NLC (2017)

positions.subtitle: Deutsche Bank
positions.description: - Worked for REIT sector of  Australia - buy-side/sell-side, M&A, IPO, debt and equity raising transactions- Responsibilities involve creating RRFPs, pitch books, financial models, industry research, company profiling, valuations, information memorandumsTransaction experience:- A$910m IPO of Viva Energy REIT (2016) - largest Australian IPO of the year- A$500m Institutional placement for DEXUS Property Group (2015)- Acquisition (c.A$2.5bn) of Investa Office Fund by a DEXUS Property Group - deal lapsed due to requisite shareholder voting for approval falling short, a classic failed acquisition case
positions.title: Senior Analyst, Australia Investment Banking
positions.description_html:
- Worked for REIT sector of Australia - buy-side/sell-side, M&A, IPO, debt and equity raising transactions
- Responsibilities involve creating RRFPs, pitch books, financial models, industry research, company profiling, valuations, information memorandums

Transaction experience:
- A$910m IPO of Viva Energy REIT (2016) - largest Australian IPO of the year
- A$500m Institutional placement for DEXUS Property Group (2015)
- Acquisition (c.A$2.5bn) of Investa Office Fund by a DEXUS Property Group - deal lapsed due to requisite shareholder voting for approval falling short, a classic failed acquisition case
